column4: i just installed ubuntu 10.04 and i want to make some modifications to the grub2 menu. if i edit/rename the files in /etc/grub.d, do i run the risk of breaking any automated update scripts or anything in the future?
or can i just go to town on them?
yes but thats why you use copies of the files
so you recommend backup -> edit as i see fit -> restore backups if i get some update errors some day?
yes, but put back ups on usb, so you can boot into a live environment and move then back
